The Sheep Market¶

“The Sheep Market is a collection of 10,000 sheep created by workers on Amazon’s Mechanical Turk. Each worker was paid $.02 (US) to “draw a sheep facing left.”

http://www.aaronkoblin.com/project/the-sheep-market/

Download the demo.
